features: 【New Modern Design】Unlike other shaky webcam stands, JCWINY webcam stand for desk comes with a heavy metal base to to keep it sturdy. The bottom of the base with foam to avoid scratching the surface of a table or desk. Perfect choose for Zoom meetings, Youtube, Tiktok, Facebook, live streaming of video games, online learning, etc

【Max Height 12 Inches】The webcam mount for desk is designed with three adjustable height levels. Can be extended the height from 6-12 inches. The ball-joint head allows for 360-degree rotation and up to a 90-degree tilt.

【Premium & Durable Webcam Stand】 The web cam stand for desk is made of solid and high-quality durable metal to make it stronger and sturdier to stay firmly on the table. The bottom of the base with foam also enhance a desk grip to help keep the camera desk mount in place without damaging a desk surface. The extendable tube is made of high grade aluminum, lightweight but with strong holding power to ensure your devices stable and never fall down.

【Universal Compatibility】The webcam holder comes with a standard 1/4-inch mounting screw. Fits most external computer cameras, such as Logitech brio, Logitech webcams C920 C920S C922x C615 C930e C922, light, mini projector, camcorders, and smart phones. The package also comes with a phone clamp for all cell phones, such as iPhone 14 Pro/14 Plus/13/12/11/8/7/6 Plus Series Samsung Galaxy S series note 10 9 and more. Use as a iPhone continuity camera mount.

【Package includes】1 x Extendable Rod, 1 x Metal Base, 1 x Phone Clamp , 1 x Rotation Platform, the external logitech webcam stand is not intended for overly heavy camera setups; please be cautious when utilizing larger devices.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: For Logitech Webcam Stand JCWINY 2023 Upgraded Webcam Mount JCWINY camera stand for desk is made of premium aluminum alloy and metal material, strong and durable for daily use. The metal base with foam pad is anti-skid and won't generate any scratches on your table. It is a great stand for Logitech webcams, cell phones, action cameras, mini projector, etc. With this camera desk mount, you can record the perfect and real-life when at a family party, a seminar, online learning or shooting video, a living stream, etc.

Features of Web Camera Stand Unlike the webcam tripod with the feets which take up sapce, JCWINY tabletop Webcam Stand is more compact and exquisite, but weighted all-metal base to provide optimal placement, portability, and stability. The weighted round base offers stronger protection to your webcams than those tripod for webcam which is easily tipped over.
How to use the webcam monitor mount? Hold the top and pull it out to adjust the height. The webcam desk mount has three adjustable height sections, easy to obtain the best height.

For Logitech Webcam Holder The webcam stand tripod with a standard 1/4" screw thread fits most devices with a 1/4-inch mounting hole, such as: Logitech streaming webcams, Gopros, action cameras, camcorders, mini projectors, etc. Compatible with Logitech Webcam C925e C922x C922 C930e C930 C920 C920S C920X C615 Brio 4K; (expect for Logitech Webcam C270 C310) Compatible with Elgato Facecam Webcams, Razer Kiyo pro, kiyo pro X, kiyo webcams and other webcams with 1/4" Thread Screw Compatible with iPhone 14, 13,12,11,X, XR,9, 9 plus, 8, 8 plus , Samsung Galaxy S21,S20,S10, Note 20,Note 10 and others. The desk camera mount is also widely used for Zoom and Tascam recorder.

For Logitech Webcam Holder The webcam stand tripod with a standard 1/4" screw thread fits most devices with a 1/4-inch mounting hole, such as: Logitech streaming webcams, Gopros, action cameras, camcorders, mini projectors, etc. Compatible with Logitech Webcam C925e C922x C922 C930e C930 C920 C920S C920X C615 Brio 4K; (expect for Logitech Webcam C270 C310) Compatible with Elgato Facecam Webcams, Razer Kiyo pro, kiyo pro X, kiyo webcams and other webcams with 1/4" Thread Screw Compatible with iPhone 14, 13,12,11,X, XR,9, 9 plus, 8, 8 plus , Samsung Galaxy S21,S20,S10, Note 20,Note 10 and others. The desk camera mount is also widely used for Zoom and Tascam recorder.

The webcam Mount is widely used for online activities such as Zoom meetings, Youtube, Tiktok, Facebook, live streaming of video games, online learning What's in the box: 1 x 360° Swivel Head, 1 x Extendable Pole, 1 x Metal Base, 1 x Cell Phone Holder

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceptional Webcam Stand - Enhances Streaming and Video Calling Experience!
reviews.reviewText: The assembly of this stand was a breeze. The build quality is impressive, offering a sturdy and durable design that easily supports the webcam without any wobble or instability. One of the standout features of this webcam stand is its height and angle adjustability. This allows us to find the perfect angle for streams and video calls, ensuring that the presentation is achieved in the best possible light. The adjustability also means it can accommodate different desk setups and personal preferences, which is a big plus. Also, the sleek and modern design of the stand blends seamlessly with my desk setup, adding a touch of professionalism to my workspace. It's aesthetically pleasing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for video calls and hands free phone use.
reviews.reviewText: Well priced and does the intended job I needed it for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: it keeps the camera in one place and worry free. If it held either the light(which I have a separate stand) and/or the microphone (which I have on another separate stand) my desk would be less cluttered, but the stand for video, by itself, for the price is a good value and does what it is advertised to do.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Insanely happy with this stand!!
reviews.reviewText: This IS the perfect stand. I've been making technical products for over 30 years, and this stand is solidly built, perfectly stylish, very adjustable, saves desk space and has no tripod style legs that can block your monitor view. The base is also heavy, which is excellent for avoiding sway, vibration, etc. I strongly recommend this stand!! \n/ :) \m/

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Haven't used it for long, so can't speak to how well it'll hold up over time, but it seems very well built and the functionality is great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my needs
reviews.reviewText: Replaced older webcam, love the stand which brings it up to face level and is stable versus trying to mount on the monitors. It works perfect with both Teams and Zoom and meets my needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Camera angle is everything
reviews.reviewText: Had my WebCam at the top of my screen got a comment from a viewer asking why I was always looking down. This great little device sits directly in front of my screen. Now straight on shot much better I’ve noticed that my customers are more engaged

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple basic post webcam holder
reviews.reviewText: The post is a little thicker than I'd like. Otherwise perfect. Solid base so this won't easily fall over, simple to attach, comes with a couple of different mounting options
